entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 3:55 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NE 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or freezing rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
